name: ALL-ENCOMPASSING SORCERER’S SIGHT
description: The Exalt commits 1 mote for the scene to perceive Essence, including dematerialized spirits and borders between realms. Artifacts glow, hearthstones burn, and all Essence use is visible as if the user had an anima. The user may roll Sagacity to analyze spirit magics, sorcery, demesnes, Wyld, or Underworld phenomena or identify Charm use. Difficulty varies by effect.

modes.name: Alchemical
modes.title: Essence Flow Detection
modes.effect: The Storyteller indicates unusual Essence fluctuations or concentrations within a day’s journey, and their direction.

modes.name: Solar
modes.title: Eye of the Unconquered Sun
modes.effect: See through illusions and magical disguises; adds Essence in bonus successes to pierce deception. Difficulty is typically 5.

modes.name: Lunar
modes.title: Scent of Midnight Dweomers
modes.effect: Determine the nature of a spirit or fae. Difficulty increases if disguised. Gives Essence as bonus successes to track targets marked by the Charm.

modes.name: Dragon-Blooded
modes.title: Secret Wind Revelation
modes.effect: Gain one bonus success on rolls to detect demons or the undead.

modes.name: Liminal
modes.title: Dark Mother’s Insight
modes.effect: Gain two bonus successes to detect ghosts, shadowlands, soulsteel artifacts, and necromantic workings when touching something related.

modes.name: Sidereal
modes.title: Telltale Symphony
modes.effect: Gain Essence in bonus successes to detect spirits, artifacts, and sorcery. Same bonus applies to understanding fate-interacting magic.

modes.name: Getimian
modes.title: Forgotten World Echoes
modes.effect: Identical to Sidereal version: Essence in bonus successes to detect spirits, artifacts, and sorcery, and to understand fate-related magic.

name: AMBUSH SENSING PREMONITION
description: The Exalt can preempt ambushes. Commit 1 mote as a simple action (scene-long) or react on Step 4 to a surprise attack by spending 1 mote. Negates non-magical surprise attack bonuses.

modes.name: Dragon-Blooded
modes.title: Distant March Intuition
modes.effect: After the attack, intuit the Size, Drill, and presence of any battle group commander within long range.

modes.name: Liminal
modes.title: Lichyard Sentinel Attitude
modes.effect: May apply this Charm to allies linked by Thread of Life within short range and defend them reflexively.

modes.name: Sidereal
modes.title: Prior Warning
modes.effect: Describe a prior contingency action taken to prepare for the danger, e.g., packing antivenin or grabbing a rope.

name: CRAFTY OBSERVATION METHOD
description: Invoke when examining evidence. Spend 1 mote per question asked during the scene. Questions include who was involved, what happened, timing, and identification methods.

modes.name: Sidereal
modes.title: Heavenly Sentinel Eye
modes.effect: May ask: How has this event disturbed destiny?

modes.name: Liminal
modes.title: Cracked Tomb Epiphany
modes.effect: May ask: What has disturbed the natural cycle of life and death here?

name: ENHANCED SENSES
description: Each purchase upgrades a sense. Gives double 9s for relevant Awareness rolls. Can be repurchased for different senses. If two senses apply, gain double 8s.

name: EVIDENCE-DISCERNING METHOD
description: Spend 1 mote per question when examining someone's possessions. Learn about the target’s Intimacies, social class, personal traits, presentation, and signatures.

modes.name: Solar
modes.title: Divine Induction Technique
modes.effect: May ask: To whom does the target answer?

name: JADE LEAVES A TRAIL
description: Spend 1 mote per question while investigating corruption or manipulation. Track influence, deception, beneficiaries, sudden wealth, debts, or hidden accounts.

modes.name: Liminal
modes.title: Blood Money Method
modes.effect: May ask: Did the target’s wealth come from unwholesome sources like crime, violence, or murder?

name: SAGACIOUS READING OF INTENT
description: Commit 1 mote. After reviewing a text, reveals an Intimacy influencing the author. Use Awareness or Sagacity rolls if deception is attempted.

modes.name: Liminal
modes.title: Reading Unwritten Passions
modes.effect: Compare the text’s emotional tone to target's emotion using passive anima power.

modes.name: Solar
modes.title: Discerning Savant’s Eye
modes.effect: Action auto succeeds unless contested by magic.

modes.name: Sidereal
modes.title: Unwritten Words Revelation
modes.effect: Learns a fact about the writing — where, emotional state, or who else observed it.

name: SPIRIT-CUTTING GLANCE
description: Commit 1 mote. See dematerialized beings and attack them. May trigger upgrades or interactions using additional motes or effects.

modes.name: Sagacity
modes.title: Demon-Wracking Shout
modes.effect: Spend 1 mote on Step 1. Dematerialized target struck is forced to materialize for scene and suffers -1 to Hardness, Soak, and Defense.

modes.name: Solar
modes.title: Uncanny Perception Technique
modes.effect: Feels warning sensation when a spirit enters medium range. Concealed spirits must contest Awareness.

modes.name: Infernal
modes.title: Wayward Divinity Oversight
modes.effect: Automatically perceives lower Essence demons and gods without activating the Charm (can’t attack them unless activated).

modes.name: Liminal
modes.title: Psychopomp’s Judgment
modes.effect: Struck ghosts or dematerialized undead become visible to others and targetable. If Demon-Wracking Shout is applied, effects are increased.

name: WITNESS RAPPORT TECHNIQUE
description: Commit 1 mote while questioning a witness. Trivial NPCs answer truthfully. For others, player is alerted to deception and gains bonus for read intentions rolls.

modes.name: Repurchase
modes.title: Judge’s Ear Technique
modes.effect: When knowingly lied to, liar must choose: Exalt knows they lied, or penalties to future deception rolls. Penalties stack to Awareness + Essence and reset each story.

modes.name: Liminal
modes.title: Speak No Ills Insight
modes.effect: If lie is about the dead or contradicts matching Virtue/Intimacy, -3 to future deception dice pools.

modes.name: Dragon-Blooded
modes.title: Shadow-Immolating Talon
modes.effect: Gain 3 bonus successes to read intentions when making a decisive attack against a liar.
